advancement.lostworlds.just_a_remnant.de: Find a fossil. The last signs of species long lost.
advancement.lostworlds.basic_explorer.de: Just the start of your exploring journey.
advancement.lostworlds.like_indiana_jone: Just the start of archaeology. Soon, you'll be like the famous Indiana Jones!
advancement.lostworlds.time_travelling.d: Just like Doc, you'll find yourself lost in time! Or, maybe, you'll be a lord of it!
advancement.lostworlds.fossils.desc: Break your first fossil! Soon, you'll have a museum or a park or a battle arena!
advancement.lostworlds.the_time_travelle: Travelled to every time era in the mod.
advancement.lostworlds.dangerous_relic.d: The broken heart of ancient civilizations! When brought together, it has the power of 8 kilatons of tnt.
advancement.lostworlds.the_permian.desc: Acquire volume 1 of the Time Lord's work!
advancement.lostworlds.the_jurassic.desc: Acquire volume 2 of the Time Lord's work!
advancement.lostworlds.the_cretaceous.de: Acquire volume 3 of the Time Lord's work!
advancement.lostworlds.the_museum.desc: You aquired all you need to make a museum, a paleontology table!
advancement.lostworlds.paleobotany.desc: Plants are cool! Ancient plants are cooler!
advancement.lostworlds.just_a_trace.desc: Aquire the soft tissue of an extinct creature.
advancement.lostworlds.decoration.desc: May not bring back creatures, but still cool!
advancement.lostworlds.in_the_field.desc: Aquire the field guide! A paleontologist's book!
advancement.lostworlds.petrified_trees.d: You found the remains of an ancient tree!
advancement.lostworlds.lost_heart.desc: The heart of ancient civilizations. One of the most powerful and dangerous items of the world!
advancement.lostworlds.jurassic_explorer: Explore every biome in the Jurassic!
Explore every biome in the Permian!
advancement.lostworlds.cretaceous_explor: Explore every biome in the Cretaceous!
advancement.lostworlds.plants_at_least_t: Plants! At Least They Don't Kill!
Plants may be an odd choise to bring back, but they don't kill people!
advancement.lostworlds.the_broken_k_t_bo: Aquire the dna of a creature!
You stripped a petrified tree! Soon, they'll be extant again!
advancement.lostworlds.charged.desc: You've done it! It's more powerful then ever! If only it could come into contact with netherite.
advancement.lostworlds.ancient_seeds.des: After lots of work, you got some seeds!
advancement.lostworlds.executioner_style: The strongest axe on the planet, perfect for anything. After a lot of work!
advancement.lostworlds.the_strongest_pic: The strongest pickaxe on the planet, who could possibly break it!
advancement.lostworlds.ungodly_dedicatio: To whomever completed this in survival, how?
advancement.lostworlds.sharpest_sword.de: Kills a wither in a few swings!
advancement.lostworlds.dr_frankenstein.d: Aquire an egg, spawn, or a syringe!
